fields.text: Part D: Other VCA Sub Population Screening in Household

fields.label: D1.1 Is the index VCA a C/ALHIV, HEI, Victim of Sexual Violence, or Children of FSW?

D1.2.Do all the siblings/other household members 0-17 years know their HIV status? (If not, offer HIV index testing/ collect dried blood spot (DBS) if VCA is HEI as part of enrollment for children/adolescents with unknown status)

D1.3 Are there children/adolescents who are HIV+ and active on treatment? (If HIV-positive categorize as an index C/ALHIV VCA; If not active on treatment, refer to treatment and care as part if enrollment)
D1.4 Is the female caregiver HIV-positive (WLHIV)?

D1.5.If the female caregiver is HIV+, do all the biological children 0-17 years know their HIV status? (if not, offer index testing as part of enrollment for all biological children 0-17 years and DBS for all HEIs)
D1.6. If other household member 0-2 years is HEI, are they receiving breastfeeding? (Categorize as HEI VCA)

D1.7 If there are children in the household aged 0-5 years, are the enrolled in an Early Childhood Development Program and are their developmental milestones tracked? (If not, refer to ECD services at enrollment)

DI.8 Have all children and adolescents in the household been screened for malnutrition? (If not, refer children and adolescents for nutrition screening or screen using mid upper arm circumference and refer malnourished children to therapeutic and supplementary feeding and offer the household nutrition counseling)

DI.9 If HEI receiving breastfeeding, are they receiving HIV testing and drugs to prevent HIV transmission and other infections in line with guidelines (If not refer and provide preventive care and support services as part of enrollment)

D1.10 If other household member 0-17 years is a victim of sexual violence, have they received clinical care (PEP, HIV testing, emergency contraceptive, STI testing, psychosocial counseling) or non-clinical care (legal services). (Categorize as victim of Sexual Violence VCA. If not all care and support services were received, refer to appropriate clinical and non-clinical services as part of enrolment)

options.text: Did not receive  non clinical care

fields.label: DI.12 Have all the male HIV-negative VCA in the household 15 years and above received voluntary medical male circumcision (VMMC)? (If not refer to VMMC services at enrollment)
D11. Has the child (6 months and above) been screened for malnutrition?
D12. Does the child/adolescent get drugs to prevent Tuberculosis (TB Preventive Therapy (TPT))?

fields.repeating_group_label: For questions DII.1 – DII.16, ask EACH OF THE AGYW 10–17 years old in the household who is not an AGYW Index VCA, in privacy. Probe where needed. If there are no AGYW 10-17 years in the household, proceed to section E

v_regex.err: Name of Adolescent can only contain letters

value.label: DII.2 Is the AGYW sexually active?
DII.3 Is the AGYW having sex with older men??
DII.4 Is the AGYW engaged in transactional sex?
DII.4 Is the AGYW engaged in sex work?
DII.5 Is the AGYW engaged in sex work?
DII.6 Is the AGYW food or economically secure?
DII.7 Did the AGYW marry early (child marriage)?
DII.8 Did the AGYW give birth before the age of 18?
DII.9  Does the AGYW have a partner who is violent or has experienced violence?
DII.10  Has the AGYW ever been diagnosed with a sexually transmitted disease?
DII.11  Has the AGYW been tested for hiv?
DII.11  Has the AGYW been tested for hiv?

fields.label: DII.12  Did the AGYW test HIV+? (if yes, the AGYW should be categorized as CLHIV) and refer to appropriate treatment and care services at enrollment
DII.13 Is the AGYW in school? If not, refer to education support services at enrollment
DII.14. Is the AGYW receiving an economic strengthening intervention? If not refer to age-appropriate economic strengthening services/DREAMS program at enrollment
DII.15 Is the AGYW using any of these HIV/pregnancy prevention methods?If ‘None of the prevention methods’, Refer and/or provide appropriate preventive services/DREAMS program at enrolment
DII.16. Did AGYW answer “yes” to any of the questions from DII.1 to DII.10 and is HIV-? (If yes, categorize as At risk AGYW)

fields.text: Part E: For Primary Caregivers Only

fields.label: E1.Have you experienced violence in the home in the last six months?
E2. Have the children experienced violence in the home in the last six months??
E3. Do you know your HIV status?
E4. If HIV positive/WLHIV, are you active on treatment? (If not, refer to appropriate treatment and care services as part of enrolment)
E5. Are you virally suppressed as of your most recent viral load test?

fields.hint: Result of most recent viral load test. (If not virally suppressed, refer and provide appropriate care and support services

v_numeric.err: Viral load can only contain numbers

v_regex.err: Please enter a valid  test name

fields.label: E7.If HIV+, do you have biological children 0-2 years?

E8. If yes, are you and your biological children enrolled in the PMTCT program? (If not, refer to PMTCT as part of enrolment and provide care and support services for the mother infant pair (MIP) using the Community PMTCT register)

E.9 hIf HIV negative, are there any reasons you may be at risk for HIV? 
(If Yes, state reason: ………………………………………………………………………………. And provide appropriate preventive services as part of enrollment)

options.hint: State reasons might be at risk of hiv

fields.label: E10.Is your household food, socially and economically secure? (for example: Able to provide 3 meals per day/ all school-going children enrolled in school; lowest level of education is secondary school; single-headed household; child-headed household; main material of the floor is not earth/sand; Has source of income through stable employment or is engaged in farming/livestock farming etc.). If not, refer to appropriate household economic strengthening program/Government Social Protection program at enrollment
THIS FAMILY IS APPROVED FOR ENROLLMENT
